interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
Indicates the content is canonical, i.e., widely agreed upon. Abbreviations of work titles are primarily in view.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

bibl.title: 1 Timothy (Peshitta Version)
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܦܘܠܘܣ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܩܕܡܝܬܐ
ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܩܕܡܝܬܐ
1 Tim
1 Timothy
ܐܶܓܰܪܬܳܐ ܕܦܰܘܠܳܘܣ ܕܰܠܘܳܬ ܛܺܝܡܳܬܶܐܳܘܣ ܩܰܕܡܳܝܬܳܐ
ܫܠܡܬ ܐܓܪܬܐ ܕܠܘܬ ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ ܩܕܡܝܬܐ ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ ܐܬܢܘܣ ܒܝܕ ܠܘܩܐ ܬܠܡܝܕܗ. ܕܐܝܬ ܒܗ̇ ܦܬ̈ܓܡܐ ܬܠܬܡܐܐ ܘܬܠܬܝܢ ܘܬܡܢܝܐ .ܘ:ܘ.
The Epistle of 1 Timothy, according to the Peshitta version
ܫܠܡܬ. ܐܓܪܬܐ. ܕܠܘܬ. ܛܝܡܬܐܘܣ. ܩܕܡܢܬܐ . ܕܐܬܟܬܒܬ. ܡܢ ܠܕܝܩܝܐ. ܘܗܘܝܐ. ܡܐܬܝܢ܀ ܘܥܣܪܝܢ. ܘܫܬܐ܀ ܦܬܓ̈ܡܝܢ:.
1 Timothy according to the Peshitta version
The Epistle of 1 Timothy
bibl.note: ܦܿܘܠܘܣ ܫܠܝܚܐ ܕܿܝܫܘܼܥ ܡܫܝܚܐ܂ ܒܿܦܼܘܼܩܕܿܢܐ ܕܿܐܠܗܐ ܡܚܝܢܢ܂ ܘܕܼܡܫܝܚܐ ܝܫܘܼܥ ܣܒܼܪܢ܃
